content:
A hyper-realistic cinematic color photograph of a powerful, athletic man walking through a wide open rugged landscape beside an exceptionally tall, powerful horse. The horse is noticeably larger than average, long-legged, heavy-boned, and imposing, with a deep chest, thick neck, broad shoulders, and clearly defined muscle structure beneath its coat. Its presence feels dominant and majestic, yet calm and controlled. The man holds a thick rope lead in his hand, the rope showing natural weight, tension, and slight sway as they walk in sync.

The man is topless, revealing a dense, naturally muscular upper body with realistic proportions: thick veiny arms, pronounced triceps and deltoids, broad shoulders, and subtle asymmetry created by real motion. Muscle compression, tendon tension, and skin stretch are visible and believable. Tattoos on the upper arm and forearm appear authentic, aged, and embedded naturally into the skin, deforming correctly with movement.

He walks forward with grounded confidence and quiet authority, posture relaxed but commanding, as if fully accustomed to handling such a powerful animal. His expression is calm, hardened, and focused, eyes looking ahead or slightly downward, never at the camera. Facial features are rugged and masculine with a strong jawline, thick uneven beard, realistic pores, fine lines, and a light sheen of sweat. Hair is dark, imperfect, and lightly disturbed by wind.

The horse walks slightly ahead or shoulder-to-shoulder with him, reinforcing its size and power. Its anatomy is accurate and lifelike, hooves kicking up dust with each step. Dust clouds rise around their legs, catching sunlight in soft golden particles. Wind moves through the scene, lifting dust, mane hair, loose rope fibers, and subtly brushing across the man’s skin, adding authentic motion.

The environment is a vast, open landscape — dry earth, rolling terrain, distant hills, sparse vegetation — grounded and real, never stylized. The color palette is cinematic but natural: warm earth tones, sunlit browns, muted greens, realistic sky blues, and gentle highlight roll-off. No oversaturation, no fantasy hues. Lighting feels like late afternoon or golden hour, directional and organic, sculpting muscle and form while preserving shadow detail.

Captured like a high-end documentary or editorial photograph using a full-frame camera with a fast prime lens. Natural depth of field, subtle motion blur in legs, dust, and rope, realistic film grain, optical imperfections, and imperfect focus falloff. The image feels candid, powerful, and timeless — not posed, not staged.

Anti-AI realism emphasis: believable scale difference, real anatomy, authentic motion physics, natural dust behavior, organic color grading, imperfect lighting, realistic skin and hair texture.",
  "negative_prompt": "AI-generated look, CGI animals, fantasy horse, exaggera

content:
"A high-fashion cinematic portrait of a woman with wavy auburn hair, wearing a deep-V neck black velvet gown. The scene is drenched in a monochromatic {argument name="lighting color" default="deep red"} studio light. A 'shutter drag' or long-exposure effect creates a ghostly, ethereal motion blur trailing to the right of her face. She has a poised, high-glance expression with bold red lipstick. One hand is gracefully touching her neck, showing a statement ring. Moody, dramatic shadows, 8k resolution, shot on 35mm lens, fashion editorial style."
>
Breakdown of Details
| Element | Description |
|---|---|
| Lighting | Saturated red monochromatic lighting with high contrast (Chiaroscuro effect). |
| Technical Effect | Shutter Drag / Motion Blur: The "ghosting" effect behind the head suggests movement during a slow exposure. |
| Subject | A woman with fair skin, freckles, and wavy {argument name="hair color" default="ginger/auburn"} hair. |
| Wardrobe | A minimalist, elegant black dress with a plunging neckline that contrasts sharply against the red background. |
| Composition | Medium shot, centered, with a soft-focus vignette that draws attention to the face and hands. |
Tips for Customizing
 * To change the mood: Replace "deep red" with "electric blue" or "neon emerald" for a different vibe.
 * To change the model: You can specify "shorter hair," "different ethnicity," or "alternative clothing" while keeping the "motion blur" and "monochromatic light" tags to maintain the style.

content:
Avant-garde romantic jewelry advertisement concept inspired by emotional connection and time-freeze. A matte blush-green cube opens like a secret vault, revealing a glowing rose-gold interior shaped with subtle heartbeat wave textures instead of glitter. Rose gold rings emerge as if paused mid-heartbeat, gently orbiting the box in an asymmetric rhythm — including abstract heart-line rings, tension-set diamond bands, and sculptural minimalist stacking rings. Instead of ribbons, translucent green silk light-trails flow like slow-motion sound waves, wrapping softly around the rings. Fine golden particles drift upward like stardust breathing in sync, mixed with faint rose mist. Cinematic lighting with soft rim highlights and emotional depth, shallow focus creating a dreamlike pause-in-time feeling. High-fashion jewelry campaign aesthetic, refined, modern, poetic. Brand names “HEARTSYNC” and “HEARTYNSNC” subtly engraved on different sides of the cube, minimal and intentional. Clean pastel background with gradient blush tones and atmospheric haze. Ultra-detailed, photorealistic with a conceptual surreal twist.

content: A slow, sensual luxury chocolate commercial shot in ultra-high definition. The scene opens in near darkness as a premium espresso-brown gift box with soft gold accents slowly rotates on a reflective surface. A warm spotlight reveals the embossed title “{argument name="product name" default="SWEET PROMISE"}” in an elegant serif font, paired with a subtle botanical emblem. As the lid gently lifts in slow motion, molten milk chocolate surges upward in a gravity-defying burst, captured at 120fps for dramatic fluid motion. Glossy heart-shaped chocolates rise and orbit the splash, rotating gracefully at different depths, their surfaces catching highlights like polished jewels. Thick chocolate ribbons stretch, drip, and shatter into silky droplets mid-air while cocoa powder blooms softly like a golden mist. Cinematic mocha-and-gold color grading, shallow depth of field, creamy bokeh background, soft rim lighting outlining every chocolate curve. Macro close-ups transition into wide hero shots, emphasizing texture, gloss, and richness. The motion feels slow, seductive, and indulgent—pure luxury confectionery advertising, premium product film, elegant pacing, emotionally rich, visually irresistible.

content:
Image should be an ultra-high-resolution, close-up, ultra-photorealistic photograph in 8K quality. It is taken with a medium format Hasselblad H6D-400c digital camera and a 100mm f/2.8 studio portrait lens, resulting in flawless sharpness, extreme detail, and a cinematic depth of field.

The person in the photo is wearing a {argument name="hat type" default="white faux-fur trapper hat"}, an oversized, voluminous dark red sweatshirt, oversized black pants, and bulky black ski boots. Their hair is black, wet, and curly, reaching to the chin. The hairstyle must match the attached first photo exactly, without any distortion.

The camera is set at knee height in front of the person, with a slight low-angle tilt to create an intimate effect. The person is sitting on the edge of a small snow slope or a low wooden platform (snow deck) that is slightly elevated above the surrounding snow.

In terms of pose, their knees are pointed toward the camera, their elbows rest on their knees, and their hands are relaxed. Their head is slightly tilted.

The background consists of bright, snow-covered alpine slopes with a clear, deep blue sky and distant mountains. The scenery surrounds the subject, and there are no ski lifts, crowds, fences, or other foreign objects in the main snow area (though some irrelevant snow tracks may appear). In the foreground, the snow is in focus, creating a silhouette effect that slightly blurs the view of the boots and snow but does not obscure the eyes and face.

The emphasis is on the details and textures of the face, skin, and clothing.

content:
[INPUT IMAGE: USER_PHOTO] Use the person in the input image as the ONLY subject. Preserve their identity and facial features clearly.

Create a hyper-realistic high-fashion editorial photo inside a surreal 3D geometric “color box” room (a hollow cube / tilted cube set). Each render MUST randomly choose:
1) a bold single-color box (monochrome environment, vivid and saturated),
2) a dynamic “cool” fashion pose (gravity-defying or extreme stretch / leap / sideways bracing against the walls),
3) a dramatic camera angle (wide-angle 24–35mm equivalent, tilted horizon, strong perspective).

The subject appears full-body and sharp, wearing an avant-garde fashion styling that feels modern and editorial (clean silhouette, stylish layering, premium fabric texture). Keep clothing tasteful and fashion-forward. The subject’s pose should feel athletic, stylish, and unusual—like a magazine campaign shot.

Lighting: studio quality, crisp and cinematic; strong key light with controlled soft shadows, subtle rim light; realistic reflections and bounce light from the colored walls. Ultra-detailed skin texture, natural pores, realistic fabric weave, clean edges, high dynamic range. 
Composition: subject centered with plenty of negative space and strong geometric lines; the box color is a SINGLE bold color and MUST be different each run (random vivid hue). The subject’s outfit contrasts well with the box color.

Output: hyper-real, photorealistic, 8k detail, editorial campaign quality, sharp focus on subject, no motion blur, no distortion of face, natural proportions.

Technical Artifacts & Color: The color palette is warm and tightly controlled, dominated by orange, amber, sand-beige, and pale yellow, contrasted by the transparent glass highlights; saturation is moderate to high in the labels and background, lower in the sand and stone; no visible chromatic aberration or lens distortion is present; edges are clean, and there is minimal grain, suggesting a controlled studio capture or lightly applied grain overlay; no motion blur or compositing artifacts are visible, despite the implausible balance. content:
Ultra-detailed cinematic portrait of a beautiful adult blonde woman standing by a tranquil lake at sunset, captured in a high-end fashion photography style. She has very long, voluminous wavy blonde hair flowing freely down her back and over her shoulders, individual strands softly lifted by a gentle evening breeze, hair glowing subtly with rim light from the setting sun. Her bright blue eyes are intense and expressive, looking directly into the camera with a confident, alluring, seductive gaze, slightly parted lips with natural rosy tone, refined facial features, smooth realistic skin texture with visible pores, soft peachy blush, subtle highlighter on cheekbones, natural lashes, minimal elegant makeup.

She is wearing a white cropped hoodie, clean and modern, slightly fitted to accentuate her waist, soft cotton fabric with realistic folds and shadows, paired with tight white leggings that contour her long legs and hips, matte fabric with gentle stretch highlights, minimalist sporty-chic aesthetic. Her pose is relaxed yet sensual: body angled three-quarters toward the camera, weight shifted to one leg, one hand lifted into her hair, fingers loosely tangled in the waves, the other arm resting naturally by her side. Her posture conveys confidence, femininity, and calm self-assurance.

The setting is a peaceful lakeside with smooth reflective water stretching into the distance. The background features a dramatic cloudy sunset sky, thick cinematic clouds layered across the horizon, painted with deep blues, smoky purples, muted violets, soft pinks, and warm golden-orange highlights from the sinking sun. The colors of the sky are mirrored on the lake’s surface, creating a symmetrical, dreamy reflection. Distant shoreline silhouettes and faint trees are softly blurred, adding depth without distracting from the subject.

Lighting is cinematic and photorealistic, golden-hour light transitioning into blue hour, warm highlights kissing her face and hair, cool ambient shadows balancing the scene, subtle backlighting creating a glowing outline around her hair and shoulders. Shallow depth of field with creamy bokeh, professional camera look, shot on a full-frame DSLR or mirrorless camera, 85mm lens, f/1.8, HDR, perfect exposure, cinematic color grading, soft contrast, rich dynamic range.

Mood is serene, sensual, and cinematic, a blend of calm nature and modern fashion elegance. content:
Create a 3x3 grid for a high-end commercial marketing campaign, centered around Alexander McQueen men's luxury sneakers.

Each frame should present a unique visual concept while maintaining perfect product consistency across all nine images.

Grid Concepts (one per cell):

1. 'Iconic Hero Shot': Eye-level side view on a dark, glossy pedestal, emphasizing the signature oversized sole.

2. 'Extreme Macro Detail': Close-up of the heel or stitching, highlighting the top-tier leather texture and the 'Alexander McQueen' logo embossing.

3. 'Dynamic Interaction': The shoe stepping onto a surface, creating a subtle and elegant splash effect of black liquid or marble powder.

4. 'Minimalist Sculptural Feel': The shoe artistically balanced on a geometric concrete or marble block, emphasizing the architectural design.

5. 'Floating Lightness': The shoe suspended in the air with dynamic hanging laces, conveying supreme comfort and lightness.

6. 'Sensory Texture': A tactile atmosphere shot focusing on the contrast between the velvet or smooth leather upper and a rough stone texture.

7. 'Monochromatic Luxury': A color-block scene where the background perfectly matches the shoe's accent color, creating a bold editorial look.

8. 'Deconstructed Craftsmanship': An abstract arrangement of raw materials (leather swatches, rubber textures) surrounding the shoe, symbolizing high-quality construction.

9. 'Surreal Fusion': The shoe integrated into a surreal, dreamlike landscape, blending realism with high fashion.

Visual Rules:
* 'Subject': Alexander McQueen men's oversized sneakers.
* 'Consistency': The shoe's shape, proportion, sole thickness, logo placement, and typography must be 100% accurate.
* 'No Distortion': No deformation of the signature sole or branding.
* 'Separation': Clear separation between the shoe and the background.

Lighting and Style:
* Soft, controlled studio lighting with dramatic rim light to highlight the shoe's silhouette.
* Subtle highlights on the leather, deep realistic shadows under the sole.
* High dynamic range, 8K resolution, ultra-sharp focus.
* Editorial luxury fashion advertising aesthetic (Vogue/GQ style).
* Color Palette: Minimalist, monochromatic, metallic, and deep matte tones.

Overall Vibe:
* Modern, sophisticated, visually coherent.
* High-end commercial campaign for a luxury fashion brand.
* Surreal, cinematic, refined, and aspirational.

content:
Use the uploaded reference photo as the single and exclusive facial identity source.
The same exact face must appear in ALL three frames with no variation.
Do not reinterpret, regenerate, beautify, or modify the face between frames.
Facial identity has highest priority over lighting, angle, blur, or realism.
Ultra-realistic vertical image split equally into three stacked frames (top / middle / bottom) within one single photo. All frames show the same person with the same face, same outfit, same location, captured seconds apart like a burst of candid smartphone shots. Only subtle movement changes. Feels accidental, real, and human.
Location & background:
Open beach night at a modern resort outdoors at night. Wooden tent in background, Warm lights glowing softly near the tent. Dark night sky visible. Beachy atmosphere. Real, moment — not staged.
Outfit (locked):
{argument name="shirt color" default="Lime green"} vertically striped button-down shirt, top buttons open showing slight chest. Full Sleeves rolled to forearms.
High-waisted cream tailored trousers. Metal wristwatch on one wrist. No jacket, no accessories beyond the watch.

Hair & Face (LOCKED)
Medium-length, thick, naturally wavy hair Slightly messy, lived-in texture
Light stubble / short beard
Real skin texture, visible pores
No smoothing, no beautification
FRAME BREAKDOWN (VERY IMPORTANT)
TOP FRAME — BACK SHOT
Back view of the subject.
He is touching the back of his hair near the neck, fingers slightly tangled in hair.
Head tilted slightly down and to the side.Relaxed posture, candid movement. Hair texture clearlyvisible from behind.
MIDDLE FRAME — CLOSE-UP
Tight close-up near the eyes and upper face.Messy strands of hair falling naturally near the eyes.
Eyes partially visible, soft focus.
Very slight motion softness from movement. Feels intimate, accidental, not posed.
BOTTOM FRAME — MID SHOT
Mid-shot from waist or chest up.
Subject leaning casually against the railing. Looking sideways, not at the camera.Expression calm, confident, contemplative.
Natural posture, effortless presence.
Lighting (LOCKED)
Warm artificial wall lighting mixed with cool night ambient light.
Soft illumination on face and shirt.
Background slightly darker.
No flash. No dramatic contrast.
Camera Feel (LOCKED)
Handheld smartphone photo
No portrait mode
No background blur.

content:
"Highly detailed close-up photograph, ultra-photorealistic, 8K resolution, shot on a Hasselblad H6D-400c medium format digital camera with a 100mm f/2.8 studio portrait lens. Impeccable sharpness, extreme detail, and cinematic depth of field. He is dressed in black wide-leg trousers and a black t-shirt. He wears a voluminous black fur coat and fashionable sunglasses, with black leather gloves. His hair is black, wet, curly, and reaches his chin. Strictly maintain the appearance from the attached first photo without distortion. The man stands next to a black G-Wagon, striking a stylish pose; one of his hands is slightly raised, while the other holds the edge of the fur coat, creating a confident and fashionable mood. The background is a snow-covered landscape with tall trees, snowflakes gently falling to the ground, adding a touch of romance to the atmosphere. The shot is taken on a mobile device using natural lighting, which highlights the simplicity and elegance of the outfit and the wintry atmosphere around. Focus on facial details, skin texture, as well as the textures of the outfit."

A confident man stands beside a black Mercedes G-Wagon in a snow-covered landscape. Tall trees rise in the background as soft snowflakes fall naturally through the scene, creating a calm, romantic winter atmosphere.

He is dressed entirely in black: wide-leg trousers, a minimal black t-shirt, and a voluminous black fur coat. One hand gently holds the edge of the coat while the other is slightly raised, forming a natural, stylish pose. He wears black leather gloves and modern sunglasses. His hair is black, wet-look, curly, and reaches chin length.

Strictly preserve the facial structure and identity from the reference image with no distortion.  
Emphasize realistic skin texture, fine facial details, and the tactile quality of fabrics—fur, leather, and cotton rendered with extreme realism.

Natural lighting only, as if captured on a mobile device outdoors, softly illuminating the subject while maintaining a cinematic, high-fashion editorial feel.  
Clean composition, shallow depth of field, strong subject separation, and a refined, confident mood.

content:
"Without changing my facial features or face. It should look realistic.
Create a highly detailed, photorealistic luxury lifestyle portrait of a young woman in her early to mid-20s with light cool-neutral skin tone and a slim figure with soft curves. Her facial identity is preserved exactly with no alteration. She has a soft heart-oval face shape, large almond-shaped blue eyes with a calm direct gaze, softly arched light-brown brows, a straight petite nose, and medium-full lips closed in a faint natural smile. Natural skin texture is visible with pores and slight asymmetry, no smoothing or beautification.
Her hair is long, dark blonde, center-parted, worn smooth and loose with natural volume at the crown.
She is wearing a deep {argument name="top color" default="chocolate-brown"} asymmetrical satin halter-style top with a gathered twist at the center, draped snugly with a soft silk sheen. The bottom is a beige nude mini skirt made of stretch jersey fabric, body-hugging with ruched sides and drawstring ties. Accessories include large gold hoop earrings, a small brown leather shoulder bag, and clear-strap high heel sandals.

Pose:
1. Kneeling on the floor with both knees tucked under, torso upright and facing the camera. Both arms raised with hands resting in the hair near the crown. Head level with a slight downward tilt, eyes looking directly into the camera.

2. Seated on the floor with legs crossed comfortably. Hands resting loosely on the knees. Spine upright but relaxed. Head tilted slightly to one side. Eyes looking toward the camera with a gentle smile. Expression warm and approachable.

3. Standing with one shoulder and upper back resting against a wall. One knee bent with the foot pressed lightly against the wall. Arms crossed loosely at the forearms. Head turned slightly to the side, eyes gazing off-frame. Expression thoughtful and distant.

The setting is a modern luxury interior with light gray stone tile flooring, floor-to-ceiling windows, dark modern kitchen cabinetry, minimalist furniture, and a white orchid plant in the foreground. Depth of field remains moderate so background elements are clearly readable.
Lighting is soft, diffused natural daylight entering from large windows behind and to the left of the camera, producing very gentle shadows with low contrast.
The camera captures a full-body kneeling portrait using a 50mm lens equivalent, framed from slightly above the head to below the knees, centered composition.

content:
Prompt: A surreal miniature winter scene in the mountains. A large blue Pringles can lies tipped over in the snow, spilling potato chips that form a winding snowboard track. Tiny snowboarders ride smoothly along the curved chip-and-snow path, carving through the slope. Snow-covered mountains and clear blue sky in the background. Bright daylight, playful fantasy tone, ultra-realistic textures, crisp snow detail, shallow depth of field.
Motion (Primary):
Mini snowboarders glide downhill in smooth arcs, carving gently along the curved track.
Secondary Motion:
Loose chip pieces tumble slowly in the snow, fine snow particles kick up behind the boards, light powder spray follows turns.
Camera:
Cinematic macro shot, slow tracking follow along the snowboard path, low angle close to the snow surface, gentle parallax as the camera moves forward, stable and smooth.
Style & Lighting:
Bright natural winter daylight, clean contrast, vibrant product colors, soft highlights on snow, realistic shadows, whimsical commercial aesthetic.
Constraints:
Keep Pringles can and logo shape stable and readable.
Snowboarders remain miniature and proportional.
No distortion of chips, no melting snow, no object duplication.
Negative Prompt:
warped logo, unreadable text, stretched can, broken snowboarders, extra limbs, chaotic motion, shaky camera, flicker, excessive motion blur, glitch artifacts.

content:
PHOTO TYPE / MOOD

Ultra-realistic editorial street-style fashion photograph, quiet luxury mood, cinematic but clean, minimal emotion, confident and composed.

SUBJECT

One stylish woman (mid-20s to early-30s), slim build, medium skin tone, hair in a tight sleek bun, wearing narrow black cat-eye sunglasses. Neutral expression, lips closed, looking back toward camera over her left shoulder.

WARDROBE / STYLING

All-black outfit: oversized structured blazer/jacket draped straight, long wide-leg trousers with soft folds pooling slightly at the shoes, black pointed-toe heels. Minimal visible jewelry. No logos on clothing. Sunglasses are glossy black, sharp angular silhouette.

POSE / BODY LANGUAGE 

Full body, standing on stone steps. Body angled to the right (walking direction), left shoulder slightly back. Head turned back toward camera. One hand relaxed near the side seam/pocket area (subtle), posture upright, calm, unhurried. Coat/blazer hangs open and straight with slight movement at hem.

LOCATION / BACKGROUND

Neoclassical building entrance façade. Large grey double doors centered behind her with decorative panels and small window-like insets. Tall white fluted columns and ornate trim around the doorway. Stone staircase and landing. Two large square planters (light stone/white) on both sides of the steps with dark green round shrubs. Additional bushy greenery on the right edge. Architectural wall details and a small mounted utility box on the upper right wall.

FRAMING / COMPOSITION

content:
A high-impact product explosion video featuring a red guava soda can centered in frame against a solid red studio background.

SCENE 1 — STILLNESS (0–3 seconds):
The soda can stands perfectly upright and completely still at the center of the frame. No liquid, no fruit, no motion. The can appears sealed, intact, and realistic with light condensation droplets. The background is clean and uniform red. Lighting is steady and neutral. No particles, no splashes, no anticipation effects. Absolute stillness is maintained for a full 3 seconds.

SCENE 2 — IMPACT BURST (instant after 3 seconds):
A violent guava splash erupts from behind the can at extreme speed. The splash is aggressive, sudden, and forceful — not cinematic, not slow motion. Thick red guava liquid explodes forward and upward, slamming into the back of the can and visibly shaking it.

Whole guavas, guava slices, and green leaves are launched outward with raw momentum, bursting through the empty space around the can. Liquid sheets tear through the air, creating sharp splashes, chaotic arcs, and dense droplets. The motion is fast, loud, and explosive.

The can remains mostly upright but reacts physically — shaking, vibrating, and slightly shifting from the impact. Fruit pieces and liquid fragments fill the frame by falling, colliding, and splashing around the can, occupying all previously empty space.

No elegance, no slow motion, no cinematic pacing. The burst feels uncontrolled, pressurized, and powerful. Lighting intensifies during the impact to emphasize liquid thickness, fruit texture, and high-speed motion. Final frames show suspended droplets, falling fruit, and liquid wrapping around the can in chaotic aftermath.

Ultra-realistic physics, extreme speed, aggressive energy, commercial-grade realism, bold contrast, explosive motion — no cinematic softness.
title: High-Impact Product Explosion Video Prompt

content:
Using the uploaded image, Create an ultra-realistic, high-fashion editorial photograph of a stunning woman with long, flowing rich dark brown hair and striking blue or green eyes.

Model & Pose:

The model is seated gracefully amidst a dense field of small, luminous buttercup-yellow wildflowers and tall emerald-green grass. Her expression is dreamy and ethereal, looking off-camera with a gentle, soft smile. Her hands are delicately clasped in her lap. The style should be lifelike with incredible detail in the skin texture, hair strands, and fabric.

Outfit (Couture Cottagecore):

She is wearing a modern interpretation of a folkloric gown: a crisp, ivory peasant blouse layered under a structured, silk-brocade bodice in a rich deep teal and antique gold pattern. The ensemble includes a voluminous skirt blending textures of linen and a saturated mustard-yellow taffeta that harmonizes with the background flowers. Subtle, heirloom-quality gold jewelry (tiny hoops, delicate rings).

Photography & Style:

Shot on a medium-format film camera (e.g., Hasselblad or Contax 645).

Lighting: Soft, directional Golden Hour lighting, with a rich, luminous quality that makes the dark brown hair catch subtle highlights and the yellow flowers glow intensely.

Focus: Extremely sharp focus on the model's eyes and the texture of her bodice, with a deep, creamy bokeh (shallow depth of field) in the immediate foreground and background.

Aesthetic Presets & Filters:

High resolution, professional color grading, cinematic, dramatic clarity, Kodak Portra 800 film grain, saturated warm tones, Vsco C1 filter for added warmth and slight desaturation of greens. Vibrant, detailed, painterly quality.

Do not change the face

content:
Ultra-realistic high-fashion editorial portrait.
A young woman captured in a low, forward-leaning crawling pose, body set diagonally across the frame, conveying controlled dominance and predatory tension. One hand firmly grounded on the studio floor, fingers naturally spread under weight; the other hand lifted close to the face, forming a sharp, claw-like gesture that subtly frames the eyes without distortion.Her expression is seductive yet intimidating — half-lidded eyes with a heavy, deliberate gaze, lips slightly parted, facial muscles relaxed but intentional. Sharp facial structure rendered with natural proportions, visible bone definition, realistic asymmetry, and true skin texture: pores, micro-imperfections, soft tonal transitions, no artificial smoothing.
Long, straight hair with blunt bangs, slightly uneven and organic, glossy but not plastic, individual strands catching the light.
Avant-garde fashion styling: fitted pants with precise tailoring and believable fabric tension; arms wrapped in feathered or fur-textured elements showing individual fibers, irregular density, and tactile depth, clearly separated from skin.
Lighting: cinematic studio setup — soft key light from the upper front shaping facial planes, strong rim light from behind to carve the silhouette, deep controlled shadows with high contrast, no flat illumination.
Camera: fashion editorial perspective, 50–85mm look, shallow depth of field, sharp focus on eyes and hands, subtle falloff across the body.
Minimalist studio background with a dark gradient or solid tone, clean and distraction-free, enhancing the sculptural pose.
Overall mood: dark, glamorous, high-fashion Vogue editorial energy — powerful, sensual, intimidating, grounded in realism.
Extreme detail, photographic realism, natural anatomy, professional fashion editorial quality, 8K clarity.

content:
Ultra-realistic moody Paris street editorial portrait, shot outside a vintage shopfront at dusk/overcast twilight, film-scanned look. A young woman (early–mid 20s), fair skin, slim build, shoulder-length light brown/dark blonde hair with a soft center/loose part, slightly tousled ends. Expression: calm, distant, slightly tired gaze; lips relaxed, almost pouting; eyes looking straight at camera with subtle softness. Pose: standing close to the shop entrance, shoulders slightly forward, body angled 3/4; one hand tucked into the coat pocket (hand visible at pocket opening), the other arm relaxed inside the oversized coat. She is framed from mid-thigh to a little above head, vertical portrait.

Wardrobe: oversized {argument name="coat material" default="brown leather/bomber-style coat"} with a worn matte sheen, slightly wrinkled texture; very large fit with dropped shoulders. Collar: thick black shearling/faux-fur collar folded up around the neck. No visible logos, no jewelry emphasis.

Location / Background details:

•She stands at the edge of a dark green/black painted wooden doorframe with aged patina; the frame runs vertically on the right side of the image.

•Behind her is a large shop window with reflective glass showing faint street reflections (trees/sky shapes), but interior objects remain visible.

•At the very top of the window, large curved cream lettering reads: “{argument name="window text" default="VINS DE PROPRIÉTÉS"}” (French text, arched across the glass).

•Inside the shop window, a botanical poster is visible on the left side (green leaves illustration), slightly blurred due to depth/reflection.

•Lower left inside the window: a display area with dark surfaces and small objects (bottles/produce-like shapes), dimly lit.

•On the far right edge, partially inside the frame, a black menu/chalkboard with small white writing is visible (text not fully readable), aligned vertically near the doorframe.

Lighting: natural ambient street light, soft and diffused; gentle highlights on cheekbones and nose; shadows are deep but not crushed. No direct flash. The shop interior glows faintly warm compared to the cooler exterior.

Color / Tone / Aesthetic: muted brown, olive-green, charcoal palette; cinematic, slightly desaturated; subtle warm sundayfunday undertone in skin and shop interior; overall dark, cozy, rainy-winter vibe (even if no rain visible). Film grain present, slight halation on highlights, mild vignette, soft contrast roll-off. Background softly blurred but readable; subject sharpest point is face and coat collar. Cooks. 

Composition / Camera: vertical portrait (approx 4:5 feel), subject centered slightly left; window text occupies upper third; doorframe and menu board anchor the right third; medium shot at eye level, ~50mm perspective, shallow-to-moderate depth of field, realistic lens softness toward edges.

Surface / python Texture cues: aged paint on doorframe, smudged window reflections, leather coat creases, fur collar fibers visible, fine pores and natural skin texture

Temperament: Gentle, relaxed, and languid Oriental female elegance.

But allow the following artistic adjustments:

Makeup can be more cinematic (retaining natural base makeup, enhancing dramatic eye expression).
Hair dynamics can show natural flow due to the autumn wind.
Emotional expression can increase cinematic narrative tension based on "gentle gaze."

[Deep Analysis of Brand DNA - Reference Image 2]
Interpretation of the "SHANG CHENG SHI" brand prototype:

Cultural Gene: Collision of Eastern classical aesthetics and contemporary fashion refinement.
Aesthetic Core: The passionate romance of vermilion red + the gentle poetry of golden ginkgo + the Eastern narrative of red wall framed views.
Target Audience Lifestyle: Urban women pursuing "relaxed elegance," loving the Guofeng atmosphere and refined dressing, aspiring to a life aesthetic that "reveals a contemporary attitude within a classical context."

Brand Visual Language:

High-saturation vermilion red as an emotional anchor.
Autumn ginkgo as a seasonal symbolic system.
Vintage gold jewelry as a carrier of refinement.
Red wall framed view as Eastern compositional philosophy.

[Narrative and Composition - Cinematic Multi-Lens Language]
First Group: Intense Portrait Close-up (Cinematic Facial Narrative)
Shot A - Eye Close-up:
Extremely close focus on the eyes and upper face. The gaze penetrates the lens, conveying the "gentle yet firm" power of the Oriental woman. Emphasize:

Golden ginkgo light and shadow reflected in the pupils.
Detailed texture of individual eyelashes.
Natural tension of subtle expression muscles around the eyes.
Blurred halo of vintage gold necklace on the neck.

Shot B - Side Profile Close-up:
45-degree side angle, capturing the perfect contour line from the forehead → nose bridge → lips → jawline. Reddish-brown curls fall behind the ear, and some strands are outlined with a golden edge by the autumn backlight. The background is a blurred collision of vermilion red walls and golden ginkgo colors.
Second Group: Body Language and Emotional Posture (Cinematic Narrative Composition)
Shot C - Full View of Chin-Resting Gaze:
[Core replication shot of Reference Image 2]
The person sits on the red wall window sill, resting their chin, curled up sideways, with soft and relaxed body lines. But add cinematic texture:

The draping folds of the vermilion red fitted dress show a delicate velvet-like texture in the light and shadow.
Gold bracelets form exquisite light spots on the wrist.
Falling ginkgo leaves create natural foreground occlusion (increasing depth of field layers).
Within the red wall frame, the golden ginkgo tree is rendered with soft focus, creating the Oriental aesthetic of a "picture within a picture."

Shot D - Hand Detail Close-up:
Tight crop: Slender fingers lightly touch the cheek, vintage gold bracelets stack on the wrist. Focus locked on:

The contrast between the fine texture of the metal chains and the warm texture of the skin.
The warp and weft details of the vermilion red cuff fabric.
The natural luster of the nails.
The background is blurred into abstract color blocks of vermilion red and gold.

Third Group: Environmental Atmosphere and Oriental Framed View (Cinematic Scene Narrative)
Shot E - Red Wall Framed Medium Shot:
Using the red wall window frame as a natural frame, the person is centered within the frame. The composition follows the Eastern "framed view into painting" philosophy, but the lighting treatment has the chiaroscuro contrast of European cinema:

The illuminated side of the red wall shows a rough, grainy texture.
The edge of the window frame forms a sharp dividing line between light and dark.
The person is softly illuminated by diffused light (from the ginkgo reflection).
The ancient ginkgo architecture in the background forms an abstract golden-yellow atmosphere outside the depth of field.

Shot F - Dynamic of Falling Ginkgo Leaves:
Capturing the moment ginkgo leaves fall in the air. Foreground leaves are sharp, the mid-ground half-body portrait is sharply focused, and the background red wall and ginkgo tree are completely blurred. Conveys "autumn flow" and "poetic time."

[Styling and Avant-Garde Aesthetics (Key Breakthrough Points)]
Clothing:

Main Body: Vermilion red fitted long dress (draping velvet or thick cotton/linen texture, fitted but not overtly sexy, conveying the "elegant restraint" of Eastern aesthetics).
Avant-garde Elements: Can add asymmetrical cuts or architectural structural lines to the cuffs and neckline, breaking the established impression of traditional Qipao.

Accessories:

Vintage Gold Jewelry: Multi-layered necklaces + stacked bracelets, the metallic luster shows a "bygone era" texture in the warm autumn light.
Unexpected Element: Can add a light sheer shawl (translucent texture) floating in the autumn wind, increasing dynamic movement and layering in the image.

Props:

Falling ginkgo leaves (can hold one, increasing interaction).
Ancient red wall window sill used as a natural seat.

This photo must feel: Original (natural relaxed feeling, not posed), Expensive (texture of high-quality fabric and gold jewelry), Deeply Tactile (the viewer can "feel" the autumn breeze and velvet texture).

[Technical Aesthetics - Cinematic Photography Parameters]
Ultra-realistic Texture:

Film Grain: Medium grain (simulating Kodak Portra 400 film), adding a sense of "time" and "warmth."
Texture Detail: Highly restore pores, hair strands, fabric warp and weft, metal scratches, and the rough surface of the red wall.
Depth of Field Control: Large aperture (f/1.4-f/2.0) to create creamy bokeh, highlighting the subject while retaining the environmental atmosphere.

Lighting - Cinematic Treatment of Autumn Natural Light:

Main Light Source: Softly diffused autumn afternoon sunlight (color temperature 3500K-4000K warm tone).
Auxiliary Light: Golden diffuse reflection from ginkgo leaves (creating soft fill light on the face).
Outline Light: Backlight outlining hair strands and body edges with a golden halo.
Shadow Treatment: Retain soft shadows (not extreme chiaroscuro contrast), maintaining the "reserved blank space" of Eastern aesthetics.

Color - Refined Editing Palette:

Main Tones: High-saturation vermilion red (#C8102E) + warm golden yellow (#F4C430).
Auxiliary Colors: Ancient architecture gray-white (#E8E8E8) + reddish-brown hair color (#8B4513).
Atmospheric Color: Warm orange-yellow ambient light (simulating the "golden hour" before autumn dusk).
Color Relationship: "Passionate collision" of red and yellow + "calm balance" of gray-white = core of "Guofeng atmosphere."

Photography Style Reference:

Paolo Roversi's soft-focus portrait texture (soft yet rich in detail).
Wong Kar-wai's film color saturation and nostalgic atmosphere.
Chinese traditional Gongbi painting's "framed composition" and "philosophy of blank space."

[Final Output Requirements]

Character Appearance: 100% restoration of facial features, hairstyle, and temperament from Reference Image 1 (hairstyle can be slightly dynamic, makeup can be cinematic, but facial contours must be absolutely precise).
Style Atmosphere: 80% reference to Reference Image 2's "Autumn Guofeng atmosphere" (red walls, ginkgo, vermilion dress, chin-resting pose) + 20% world-class fashion photography's "cinematic texture and avant-garde styling."
Technical Standards:

4K/8K ultra-high definition quality.
Cinematic color grading (warm autumn color temperature).
Medium film grain.
Precise depth of field control (sharp subject, soft focus background).

Brand Exposure: Retain the "{argument name="Brand Name" default="SHANG CHENG SHI"}" brand logo at the top of the image (elegant modern font, not distracting from the main subject).
Final Tone: This is not an ordinary fashion editorial, but a cross-cultural visual work that "can simultaneously exist on the cover of an international fashion magazine and in an Oriental aesthetics art book."
title: Cinematic Chinese Style Fashion Editorial Prompt
description: An extremely long and detailed Nano Banana Pro prompt for generating a high-fashion editorial image in a Chinese national style (Guofeng), inspired by actress Zhao Lusi and set in the ancient architecture of Chengdu. The prompt meticulously defines the subject's required facial features (100% strict adherence to reference image), styling (vermilion red dress, gold accessories, autumn ginkgo theme), and cinematic technical parameters (Kodak Portra 400 grain, f/1.4-f/2.0 shallow depth of field, warm amber lighting). It uses the 'framed view' (框景) aesthetic common in Chinese art and references photographers like Paolo Roversi and director Wong Kar-wai.

content:
World-class cinematic Chinese style fashion portrait photography, top master photographer level (Steven Meisel / Paolo Roversi / Harley Weir level), creating a defining image advertisement for the high-end Chinese lifestyle brand "Yu Zhoukan" and the Nanan District image ambassador. Single complete composition. === Character - 100% Strict Restoration of Reference Image 1 Facial Features === Character Positioning:
Nanan District Image Ambassador, modern Oriental woman, representative of urban cultural elites returning home to seek roots. Precise Facial Feature Replication:
[{argument name="facial description" default="Fill in specific facial description from Reference Image 1 here"}] Face Shape: [{argument name="face shape" default="Describe based on Figure 1 - oval/round/square/heart-shaped face"}]
Eyes: [Based on Figure 1 - eye shape/double eyelids/gaze characteristics]
Nose: [Based on Figure 1 - bridge height/nose shape]
Lips: [Based on Figure 1 - lip shape/corner characteristics]
Skin Tone: [Based on Figure 1 - specific skin tone description]
Unique Features: [Based on Figure 1 - any iconic features]

Hair Style - Adapted from Reference Image 2 Style:
Messy high bun, intentionally imperfect and casual, soft strands naturally falling around the cheeks and neck, conveying the relaxed aesthetic of "no need for elaborate refinement after returning home," not over-styled, embracing natural texture and dynamism. Expression:
Eyes gazing towards the camera (or looking towards the distant Huangshan clouds and mist), with relaxed confidence, a subtle mysterious smile hinting at inner peace and cultural rootedness, embodying the narrative of "modern women reconnecting with their ancestral home," the expression is communicative rather than merely posed, a blend of natural relaxation and quiet strength. === Composition - Single Complete Cinematic Frame === Image Composition:
Medium-long shot full-body portrait, cinematic horizontal 16:9 wide composition. Figure Position: Center-right or center-left (following the rule of thirds), occupying 60-75% of the image height.
Perspective: Eye-level or slight low angle (5-10 degree upward angle), creating an elegant and grand feeling.
Depth of Field: Medium depth of field T2.8-T4.0, the main subject is sharp and crisp, the background mountains and clouds are softly blurred but still recognizable in layers.
Negative Space: Ample sky/mountain negative space to create a sense of breathing room and poetry, not cluttered.

Focus Distribution:
Primary Focus: Subject's facial expression and overall posture.
Secondary Focus: Hand movements (holding a pipe) and clothing details (texture of the red top).
Environmental Focus: The ink-wash poetic quality of the Huangshan cloud and mountain background. === Styling - Avant-garde Chinese Contemporary Aesthetic === Clothing (Based on Reference Image 2 Aesthetic):
Main Top: Oversized cinnabar red (#C8402B) loose Chinese style top. Fabric: High-end silk-cotton blend with delicate traditional hidden patterns.
Texture: Visible weave texture, slight sheen, natural wrinkles conveying relaxed luxury.
Cut: Intentionally oversized, flowing sleeves, embodying the "relaxed aesthetic."
Details: Mandarin collar or modern interpretation, traditional frog buttons or contemporary modification.

Bottoms: Cream off-white (#F5F0E8) loose wide-leg pants. Material: High-quality linen or cotton, natural drape.
Cut: Palace style, flowing.
Function: Balances the visual intensity of the red top, grounding the overall look.

Bold Styling Choices (Key Elements - Creating an Art House Atmosphere): Unexpected Accessory: Traditional wooden pipe (not a cigarette) - cultural artifact as a fashion statement.
Zisha teapot + tea tray appearing as editorial props in the scene, not just decoration.
Ancient stone railing covered in moss as a "fashion runway" - nature meets high fashion.
Juxtaposition Aesthetic: Contemporary fashion sensibility × Traditional Chinese lifestyle objects × Native natural environment.

No conventional jewelry - allowing cultural props and the natural scene itself to become accessories. === Shooting Scene - Huangshan Cloud Sea Mountains (Anhui) === Environmental Setting:
Huangshan cloud sea background, layered mountains in Anhui, China emerging from flowing clouds and mist (ink-wash visual aesthetic).
Foreground: Ancient stone railing/platform covered in moss - weathered texture clearly visible.
Pine trees faintly visible in the mist - mysterious depth.
Atmosphere: Ethereal, timeless, connecting past and present.

Spatial Relationship:
The figure sits casually on the ancient stone railing (one leg propped up, one leg hanging down), the body is relaxed, not posed. One hand rests on the stone surface, the other elegantly holds the pipe. The posture conveys the relaxed state of "no need for pretense after returning home." The overall image presents an Oriental aesthetic where the figure and the landscape coexist harmoniously. Depth of Field Layers:
Foreground: Mossy stone railing details visible (slightly blurred).
Midground: Main subject is sharp and crisp.
Background: Huangshan cloud sea mountains are softly blurred, maintaining an ink-wash layered feel. === Posture Design - Core of Relaxation === Overall Posture:
Sitting casually and naturally on the ancient stone railing, not sitting rigidly, the body slightly angled, showing extended lines. Specific Details: One leg propped up (knee bent, foot resting on the railing edge).
Other leg naturally hanging down or slightly bent.
One hand resting on the stone surface (showing intimate contact with the environment).
Other hand elegantly holding the pipe (near the lips or naturally lowered).
Upper body slightly leaning forward or sideways, not stiff.
Head can be slightly tilted or raised, gaze directed towards the camera or the distant mountain view.

Posture Keywords:
Relaxed, extended, casual, comfortable, unposed, integrated with the environment, conveying "homecoming relaxation." === Lighting Design - Cinematic Drama and Natural Diffusion === Main Light Source:
Soft directional diffused light (simulating natural scattering by clouds and mist). Source: Simulating the natural diffusion effect of mountain clouds and mist, no hard shadows.
Texture: Wrapping, soft, showcasing skin texture without roughness.
Color Temperature: Cool neutral 5200K (misty mountain atmosphere).
Intensity: 75% to create subtle three-dimensionality.

Dramatic Fill Light:
Selective edge light coming from the rear or side-rear, penetrating the mist to create separation from the misty background.
Intensity: 30-40% - subtle, not overwhelming.
Effect: Soft halo on the bun, shoulder line, and clothing edges, creating an ethereal texture.
Outlines the figure's silhouette, increasing image depth.

Light and Shadow Contrast Elements (Paolo Roversi Influence):
Strategic shadows on the face and body to create emotional depth. Natural shadows under the cheekbones, neck, and clothing folds to sculpt three-dimensionality.
Contrast Ratio: 60:40 (Bright:Dark) - softer than dramatic fashion, harder than pure natural light.
Maintains an overall soft atmosphere, avoiding overly dramatic effects.

Atmospheric Haze:
Visible light beams penetrating the mist in the background (Tyndall effect) to increase cinematic volumetric light effect.
Enhances the "homecoming poetry" atmosphere.
Creates a mysterious and hazy Oriental artistic conception. === Color Grading - Refined Editorial Palette === Main Color Tones (Based on Reference Image 2): Cinnabar Red (#C8402B) - Saturation 65% (Main color of the clothing).
Symbolizes "hometown warmth and cultural temperature."
Visual focus and emotional center of the image.

Ink-wash Gray-Blue (#8BA3B0) - Saturation 45% (Mountain mist atmosphere color).
Creates the "ink-wash poetic" texture.
Occupies a large area of the background.

Cream Off-White (#F5F0E8) - Saturation 40% (Pants, balancing the intensity of the red).
Represents purity and simplicity.

Accent Colors: Moss Dark Green (#4A5A48) - Saturation 50% - Stone railing transition element, connecting the figure and nature.
Natural Skin Tone - Enhanced but realistic, warm undertone.
Teaware Brown (Zisha #8B6F47) - Cultural prop details.
Sky/Cloud White-Gray - Large negative space to create a sense of breathing room.

Overall Color Grading Direction:
Soft richness - not overly saturated commercial film, not flat art film. Shadows: Slightly lifted (-0.15 lift value) to create a gentle atmosphere.
Highlights: Softened peaks, creating a film texture.
Midtones: Skin areas slightly warmed, background slightly cooled.
Contrast: Medium-high (78-82%) - three-dimensional without being harsh.
Color Harmony: Warm red (warm tone) vs. blue-gray mist (cool tone) forming complementary contrast.

=== Technical Execution - Hyper-realistic Film Aesthetic === Camera and Lens:
Medium format digital camera (Hasselblad H6D / Phase One XF). Sensor: 100 megapixels for extreme detail capture.
Lens: 85mm F2.0 or 50mm F2.0 portrait lens (selected based on composition distance).
Rendering: Film-like tonal transition, not clinically sharp digital clarity.

Film Simulation:
Kodak Portra 400 pushed one stop aesthetic. Strongly visible film grain (ISO 800 equivalent grain structure).
Organic texture throughout the image.
Slight halo effect on highlights (glowing edges of red fabric).
Natural color response, slightly warm neutral.

Texture Details - Key Requirements:
Clearly visible at normal viewing distance: Skin: Natural pores, fine lines, healthy texture, light retouching preserving realism.
Fabric: Weave texture of silk hidden patterns, natural wrinkles, sheen variation.
Stone: Rough moss texture, weathered surface cracks, lichen details.
Mist: Volumetric atmospheric layers, not flat overlay.
Hair: Strand texture, natural flyaways, fluffy feel.

Depth of Field Strategy:
Medium depth of field T2.8-T4.0. Main subject sharp from head to toe.
Foreground stone railing details visible but slightly softened.
Background Huangshan cloud sea mountains softly blurred, maintaining ink-wash layering and recognizability.
Overall

content:
Ultra-detailed close-up studio portrait, front-facing and centered composition. A young adult woman with fair, smooth skin and subtle natural freckles. She has striking light blue eyes and dark brown hair styled in a loose, slightly messy updo, with soft, wispy strands falling around her forehead, temples, and cheeks, giving a relaxed yet editorial look. Hair texture appears slightly damp or naturally tousled, not overly styled.  
She wears narrow, rectangular black sunglasses with glossy frames and warm {argument name="lens color" default="orange-tinted"} lenses. The sunglasses sit low on the bridge of her nose, partially revealing her eyes above the lenses, creating a playful, confident, fashion-forward expression. Her eyebrows are natural and softly defined. Makeup is minimal and clean: natural skin finish, soft blush, lightly defined lips, no heavy contouring.  
Her facial expression is subtly flirtatious and relaxed, with a gentle closed-mouth smile. One hand is raised toward her face, with her index finger lightly touching her lower lip. Fingernails are neatly manicured and painted a vivid orange that matches her outfit and accessories.  
She is wearing a bright orange sleeveless knitted top with visible woven texture and fine fabric detail. The knit pattern is clearly defined, showing depth and realism in the material. Accessories include bold circular orange hoop earrings that complement the color palette. The color coordination between sunglasses lenses, earrings, nail polish, and clothing is intentional and cohesive.  
Lighting is bright, soft, and evenly diffused studio lighting, with no harsh shadows. Skin tones are natural and well-balanced, highlighting realistic texture and fine details. Background is a clean, minimal, light gray or off-white studio backdrop with no visible objects or distractions.  
Modern fashion editorial photography style. Sharp focus on the face and hand, high-resolution detail, professional studio quality. Neutral color grading with strong emphasis on warm orange tones for visual contrast. Crisp clarity, realistic proportions, natural anatomy, refined aesthetic. Shot with a high-end camera look, shallow depth of field, smooth background separation, polished yet effortless mood. --ar 9:16

content:

Sheer black mesh gloves on both hands,
multiple stacked diamond rings including a large solitaire,
diamond eternity bands,
layered slim diamond bangles and one thicker bracelet,
diamond tennis choker fitted closely to the neck,
matching diamond stud earrings.

Outfit:
Deep Purple halter-neck couture gown, clean neckline, luxury fabric, sharp tailoring.

Hair & Makeup:
Hair softly voluminous, natural movement.
Makeup is Vogue beauty standard: flawless realistic skin texture, soft sculpted cheekbones, warm nude lips, refined lashes, subtle smoky eyes.

Lighting & Camera:
Soft directional studio lighting, gentle shadow sculpting,
medium-format editorial lens, neutral gray background.

high-fashion editorial realism,

content:
Ultra-realistic moody Paris street editorial portrait, shot outside a vintage shopfront at dusk/overcast twilight, film-scanned look. A young woman (early–mid 20s), fair skin, slim build, shoulder-length light brown/dark blonde hair with a soft center/loose part, slightly tousled ends. Expression: calm, distant, slightly tired gaze; lips relaxed, almost pouting; eyes looking straight at camera with subtle softness. Pose: standing close to the shop entrance, shoulders slightly forward, body angled 3/4; one hand tucked into the coat pocket (hand visible at pocket opening), the other arm relaxed inside the oversized coat. She is framed from mid-thigh to a little above head, vertical portrait.

Wardrobe: oversized {argument name="coat material" default="brown leather/bomber-style coat"} with a worn matte sheen, slightly wrinkled texture; very large fit with dropped shoulders. Collar: thick black shearling/faux-fur collar folded up around the neck. No visible logos, no jewelry emphasis.

Location / Background details:

•She stands at the edge of a dark green/black painted wooden doorframe with aged patina; the frame runs vertically on the right side of the image.

•Behind her is a large shop window with reflective glass showing faint street reflections (trees/sky shapes), but interior objects remain visible.

•At the very top of the window, large curved cream lettering reads: “VINS DE PROPRIÉTÉS” (French text, arched across the glass).

•Inside the shop window, a botanical poster is visible on the left side (green leaves illustration), slightly blurred due to depth/reflection.

•Lower left inside the window: a display area with dark surfaces and small objects (bottles/produce-like shapes), dimly lit.

•On the far right edge, partially inside the frame, a black menu/chalkboard with small white writing is visible (text not fully readable), aligned vertically near the doorframe.

Lighting: natural ambient street light, soft and diffused; gentle highlights on cheekbones and nose; shadows are deep but not crushed. No direct flash. The shop interior glows faintly warm compared to the cooler exterior.

Color / Tone / Aesthetic: muted brown, olive-green, charcoal palette; cinematic, slightly desaturated; subtle warm sundayfunday undertone in skin and shop interior; overall dark, cozy, rainy-winter vibe (even if no rain visible). Film grain present, slight halation on highlights, mild vignette, soft contrast roll-off. Background softly blurred but readable; subject sharpest point is face and coat collar. Cooks. 

Composition / Camera: vertical portrait (approx 4:5 feel), subject centered slightly left; window text occupies upper third; doorframe and menu board anchor the right third; medium shot at eye level, ~50mm perspective, shallow-to-moderate depth of field, realistic lens softness toward edges.

Surface / python Texture cues: aged paint on doorframe, smudged window reflections, leather coat creases, fur collar fibers visible, fine pores and natural skin text

content:
This extremely detailed, high-definition photographic portrait captures a female cosplayer dressed in a magnificent 'Honor of Kings' Phoenix-themed costume.

**Composition and Pose:** A vertical, medium full-body composition is used, with the protagonist centered and slightly turned to the side. She delicately holds an orange-red feather fan in her right hand and a refined golden phoenix scepter in her left, the top of which is inlaid with a glowing sphere. The dynamic standing pose, combined with a slightly high-angle shot, enhances the character's elegance and presence.

**Lighting Design:** The image features professional studio-level lighting. A large softbox above provides uniform, delicate front lighting, perfectly outlining the character's facial contours and skin texture. Several colored LED stage spotlights are arranged on the ground, emitting blue, purple, and red multi-colored light, casting dynamic and layered colors onto the background and floor.

**Art Style:** Modern realistic photography style, featuring extremely high clarity and color saturation. The image merges the fantasy of game art with the refinement of commercial portrait photography, with sharp details, presenting a cinematic character depiction.

**Color Scheme:** The core palette consists of magnificent vermilion, bright gold, and pure white. The skirt of the costume features gradient feather textures transitioning from golden yellow to orange-red and deep purple. The background uses deep purple and indigo exhibition posters as a base, forming a sharp cool/warm contrast with the character's warm red and gold main tones, making the subject stand out.

**Visual Details:** The protagonist has cascading silver-white long curly hair and wears a golden hollow crown inlaid with rubies. The costume details are extremely meticulous, including white feather chest ornaments, red velvet-textured fabric, and layered golden metal armor. The faintly visible exhibition crowd and game logos in the background add realism and narrative depth to the environment.

description: A highly detailed, photorealistic image generation prompt for creating a female character cosplay portrait based on the 'Phoenix' theme from the game 'Honor of Kings' (Wangzhe Rongyao). The prompt specifies composition, lighting design (professional studio setup with colored LED stage lights), artistic style (modern realism with high clarity), color scheme (red, gold, white with cool/warm contrast), and intricate visual details of the costume and setting.

content:
Luxury fashion advertisement, blog post, 4:5 ratio.

COMPOSITION:
A young Caucasian woman in her early 20s with slim oval face and V-line jawline, seated elegantly at a Parisian cafe. She has long flowing wavy light brown hair with golden caramel highlights cascading over her shoulders. Large bright blue-green doe eyes with long natural lashes, luminous dewy porcelain skin with healthy glow and glass skin effect, soft rosy blush on cheeks, glossy pink lips with radiant subtle smile, slim straight nose, delicate feminine features, ethereal doll-like beauty.

She wears a {argument name="suit color" default="cream-colored"} tailored power suit with elegant draping, paired with a delicate layered gold necklace. A designer handbag rests on the marble cafe table beside a steaming cup of coffee.

DYNAMIC ELEMENTS:
Subtle motion blur as she turns her head slightly with gentle head tilt, soft dreamy expression, steam rising from the coffee cup creating warmth and atmosphere.

CAMERA: Hasselblad X2D, 85mm f/1.4 lens, soft diffused golden hour lighting, shallow depth of field, beauty retouching with luminous skin detail.

Style keywords: Parisian elegance, power dressing, luxury fashion, ethereal Caucasian beauty, golden hour, warm cream and soft gold tones, high-end fashion editorial.

A stylish handwritten signature "Willy" is elegantly placed in small letters at the Bottom Right corner.

content: Create a photorealistic candid street-fashion portrait with extreme shallow depth of field where a single woman is sharply in focus in the mid-ground, surrounded by a moving crowd rendered as soft blur/bokeh. Preserve the exact framing, subject placement, color grade, and atmosphere. 1) Composition & Framing (LOCK) • Aspect: 4:5 vertical. • Camera height: chest-to-eye level (slightly above the subject’s shoulder line). • Framing: mid-ground subject centered slightly left-of-center, from upper chest to top of head clearly visible; shoulders included; background heavily blurred. • Foreground: two large blurred human shapes frame the subject: • Left foreground: blurred middle-aged man occupying left third, grey/blue jacket, face out of focus. • Right foreground: blurred person occupying right-lower quadrant (dark hair), also out of focus. • Mid-right: blurred older bald man head/shoulder visible behind subject’s right shoulder. • Background: dense city street with yellow taxi/cab shapes and warm orange bokeh lights; tall urban forms dissolve into creamy blur. 2) Subject (Primary) • Person: young adult woman, fair/light skin, subtle freckles, natural editorial beauty. • Hair: medium brown, messy low updo/bun with loose wisps; slightly damp/urban texture; flyaways framing face. • Expression: calm, slightly serious/curious; lips relaxed; eyes looking directly toward camera with a soft, neutral intensity. • Pose: body facing right (3/4 profile), head turned back over left shoulder to look at camera. 3) Wardrobe & Accessories (Exact Feel) • Outerwear: {argument name="outerwear color" default="beige/tan"} trench coat (matte cotton), collar open, classic lapels, slightly rumpled city-wear texture. • Bag: small shoulder bag with thin gold chain strap on her right shoulder; strap catches a bit of light; bag itself mostly hidden. • Jewelry: small earring visible (subtle, warm tone). 4) Environment (Street Mood) • Busy metropolitan sidewalk/street scene, crowd density high. • Background palette: teal/green-grey city haze + yellow cab + warm orange bokeh lights. • No readable signage, no sharp background details—everything behind subject remains creamy blur. 5) Lighting (LOCK) • Natural daylight, overcast-to-soft sun (diffused), no harsh shadows. • Subject face evenly lit with gentle highlights on cheekbones and nose; cinematic soft contrast. 6) Camera & Optics (CRITICAL) • Look: telephoto candid portrait with strong compression. • Lens: 85mm–135mm range, wide open (f/1.4–f/2.0). • Focus: tack-sharp on subject’s eyes and eyelashes; foreground and background strongly out of focus. • Depth: creamy bokeh, smooth falloff, mild cat-eye bokeh at edges. • Shutter/feel: background crowd appears naturally blurred from DOF; slight motion blur suggested in foreground figures. 7) Color Science / Grade (LOCK) • Cinematic teal/green wash in shadows and background. • Warm highlights (skin tones natural, slightly warm). • Yellow taxi pops softly; orange bokeh lights glow. • Fine

content:
A professional, high-end photograph emphasizing the physical interplay of light and shadow on real surfaces.
A young woman stands with her back to the camera, body turned slightly to the side. Her posture is calm and composed. Her back is fully visible. She wears an elegant backless evening dress made of matte silk with a subtle {argument name="dress color" default="gray-blue / ice-blue"} tone.The fabric is thin, fluid, naturally draped, with fine shoulder straps that follow the natural line of her shoulders and spine. No exaggerated sheen — true silk texture with gentle light absorption.
Soft, irregular shadows from tree branches and leaves fall naturally across the skin of her back, shoulders, and the dress fabric, as if warm sunlight is filtering through foliage and a nearby window frame. The shadow patterns are organic, imperfect, and uneven — realistic, not decorative.
Her head is slightly turned, revealing only a partial profile. A thin gold hoop earring catches a small, sharp highlight from the sunlight. No facial emphasis — the face remains secondary and partially obscured.
A strong, clearly defined shadow of her head and shoulders is cast onto a dark gray-blue matte wall in front of her, creating graphic contrast and visual depth. The wall has a minimal surface with subtle rectangular geometric highlights caused by directional light.
An elegant, narrow vertical mirror hangs on the wall. In the reflection, a small, neat bouquet of {argument name="flower type" default="cornflowers"} is visible, held gently in front of her body — understated, quiet, symbolic.
LIGHTING Strong, low, warm directional sunlight coming from the side. High contrast between illuminated skin and deep shadow. Distinct leaf shadow patterns visible on skin and fabric. No artificial lighting, no beauty lighting, no glow.
CAMERA Medium shot from behind, slightly offset to the side. Camera positioned at shoulder height. 50–85mm photographic look. Shallow depth of field — her back and earring in crisp focus, background softly blurred. Natural perspective, no distortion.
MOOD & ATMOSPHERE Quiet, intimate, cinematic. Refined minimalism. Poetic realism. Feels like a carefully observed moment, not a staged pose. No stylization, no fantasy — realism driven by light, texture, and composition.
QUALITY NOTES Natural skin texture visible (pores, subtle tonal variations). No smoothing, no retouching. No glamour filters. True-to-life color grading with restrained saturation.
title: Poetic Realism Portrait with Light and Shadow Interplay
description: A highly detailed prompt for generating a cinematic, intimate portrait focused on the physical interaction of strong directional sunlight, shadows, and surfaces. The subject is a woman in an elegant backless silk dress, with organic leaf shadows falling across her skin and fabric, emphasizing realism, texture, and high contrast.

content:
A candid, indoor mirror selfie of an adult woman seated on the edge of a neatly made bed in a minimalist, modern bedroom. She leans forward slightly, elbows resting on her knees, holding an {argument name="phone model" default="iPhone 16 Pro"} in one hand as she captures her reflection. Her posture is relaxed yet intentional, conveying confidence and quiet self-awareness. Her gaze is directed toward the phone screen, lips gently pursed, expression neutral and contemplative.
She wears a fitted, sleeveless cropped tank top in a deep {argument name="top color" default="brown or muted plum"} tone, paired with white low-rise underwear. On her feet are chunky, retro-style athletic sneakers in neutral tones with soft yellow accents, worn with mid-calf white socks featuring dark stripes. The outfit blends casual intimacy with sporty streetwear aesthetics. Her physique is lean and athletic, with natural proportions and subtle muscle definition.
Her hair is long, dark, and straight, slicked back neatly and tucked behind her shoulders, adding to the clean, understated look. Her skin tone is warm and evenly lit, with soft shadows defining the contours of her arms, legs, and torso.
The room is softly lit with warm indoor lighting, creating a cozy, lived-in atmosphere. The bed is dressed in crisp white linens. A small wooden bedside table sits nearby, holding minimal personal items, adding realism and intimacy to the scene. Behind her, a wall niche or shelf contains a few books and visible electrical outlets, reinforcing the casual, real-life setting. The floor is smooth and neutral-toned, possibly concrete or polished stone.
The composition is vertical and slightly angled, typical of a mirror selfie, with natural framing that feels spontaneous rather than posed. The mirror reflection includes subtle perspective distortion, enhancing authenticity. The color palette is muted and warm—whites, browns, skin tones, and soft neutrals—giving the image a modern, editorial lifestyle feel.
Captured with a smartphone camera, featuring realistic lighting falloff, slight grain, and natural color balance. The overall aesthetic is intimate, contemporary, and unfiltered—blending everyday realism with understated fashion and personal expression.

Prompt 1:
"Use the uploaded image as the PRIMARY and ONLY identity reference.
Preserve the subject’s exact face, age, bone structure, facial proportions, eye shape, nose shape, lip shape, jawline, cheekbones, skin tone, natural skin texture, hairline, hair density, and hair texture with high identity fidelity.
Do NOT change the face in any way — no beautification, no face swap, no aging/de-aging, no symmetry correction that alters identity.
Create a high-resolution, photorealistic nightclub scene: Stylish woman wearing a fitted {argument name="dress color" default="red"} dress, leaning on a glass railing
– Neon club lighting with purple, blue, and pink LED lights
– Crowded dance floor in the background with soft bokeh and motion blur
– Confident, glamorous nightlife vibe
– Natural human proportions and posture
– Realistic fabric folds, skin texture, and lighting interaction
Camera & Quality:
– Professional DSLR look, shallow depth of field
– Sharp facial focus, cinematic lighting 
Ultra-realistic, 4K–8K detail
Important constraints:
– Keep facial expression natural and human
– Eyes must be aligned, realistic, and symmetrical without changing shape
– No plastic skin, no over-smoothing
– Maintain realism over stylization"

content:
A black-and-white, high-contrast, ultra-glamorous street fashion editorial photograph taken with an ultra-wide-angle lens that creates the effect of a slight perspective deformation. A vertical composition in the center of a large urban space surrounded by high-rise buildings that rise up and converge to the center of the frame, forming a dramatic architectural geometry. It's a winter day, there is an uneven layer of snow and ice on the ground, the surface is matte, with the texture of frozen asphalt. The contrast is soft at the top of the frame due to the atmospheric haze. In the foreground is the young man standing closest to the camera. He's wearing large rectangular dark sunglasses. Hairstyle-short, with dense front

styling, partially disheveled, slight asymmetry of strands. The emotion is neutral, serious, and the gaze is directed directly into the lens. He is wearing a voluminous long coat with a massive collar, under which multi-layered clothes are visible, including a thick shirt with a pronounced checkered texture. A large heavy chain with massive links hangs on the chest, visually dominating the composition. Behind, to the left and right of the man, there are two men dressed identically in dark ensembles: thick coats or jackets, smooth fabrics that emphasize a strict silhouette. They wear large chains of a similar type, stacked on top of clothes. They wear dark sunglasses. They stand statically, strictly, with their legs slightly apart, arms lowered or gathered in front of them. Their figures create balance on the sides of the frame. On the left behind there is a sports car with a low wide body and a pronounced wedge-shaped front. The polished metal reflects the

surrounding buildings and the sky. The car is parked on a snow-covered surface next to a small city Christmas tree, surrounded by metal fences..

The fir tree is fluffy and rich in tone, contrasting with the smooth surfaces of cars and skyscrapers. The urban backdrop consists of densely packed skyscrapers stretching into the misty sky. Their glass and concrete facades create vertical rhythms. The light is diffused, wintry, soft, without pronounced shadows. The color scheme is a pure monochrome palette with deep shadows and even light areas. The processing is glossy, with a light feel of an advertising photo shoot, moderate grain, high sharpness in the foreground.

content:
A high-fashion, cinematic portrait of {argument name="subject name" default="Sydney Sweeney"} emerging dramatically from a colossal, highly sculpted mass of rainbow-colored cotton candy. The spun sugar is meticulously rendered, forming the structural ruins of a classical Greek amphitheater, complete with crumbling pillars and tiered seating, all made of hyper-realistic, translucent cotton candy fibers. She is styled in a flowing, bespoke iridescent white gown that contrasts sharply with the vibrant, saccharine environment. Focus is placed on the macro details of the spun sugar texture, exhibiting crystalline structure and soft, ethereal translucence where light passes through. The overall aesthetic is maximalist food surrealism meets editorial portraiture.

**Camera & Lens:** Shot on Phase One IQ4 150MP, 120mm Macro lens, detailed texture focus, aperture f/8. Cinematic, shallow depth of field for the foreground elements, but maintaining crisp detail on her face and the immediate cotton candy structure.

**Lighting Details:** Volumetric lighting filtering through the spun sugar tiers, internal colored backlighting (electric magenta, cyan, and lemon yellow gels) creating a dramatic, ethereal glow from within the cotton candy. Strong, directional rim light defining the precise strands of sugar and highlighting the texture of her dress. Clean, soft fill light for perfect skin tones.

**Aesthetic Modifiers:** Hyper-detailed food photography, maximalist surrealism, high dynamic range, editorial fashion spread, crystal clear focus, high saturation.

**Text overlay:** 'Text overlay: "{argument name="text overlay" default="SWEET CHAOS - The Sydney Sweeney Issue"}"'

content:
'''
TYPE: Print-ready sticker sheet (sponsor decal sheet style), clean 2D vector look.

CANVAS / PRINT:
- 2480 x 3508 px, 300 DPI (A4), portrait
- Bleed: 3mm
- Safe margin: 5mm (no sticker may cross into margin)
- Background: pure white (#FFFFFF), flat

STICKER CUT SYSTEM (CONSISTENT ACROSS ALL):
For each logo:
1) Die-cut outline: thick WHITE kiss-cut border (uniform thickness)
2) Visibility stroke: thin LIGHT-GRAY stroke outside the white border (so it reads on white paper)
3) Shadow: subtle soft drop shadow (offset 6–10 px, blur 12–18 px, opacity 12–18%), print-clean

SIZE CONSTRAINTS (STRICT):
Each sticker must fit inside:
- Max width: 945 px (8 cm)
- Max height: 709 px (6 cm)
- Min height: 354 px (3 cm)
Vary sizes but never exceed maxima.

LOGO RULES (STRICT):
- Logos only. No extra headings, no labels, no decorative text.
- Typography is allowed only if it is part of the official logo artwork.
- No duplicates. Exactly 28 unique stickers.

LOGO LIST (EXACT, 28 ITEMS):
1 Go
2 Next.js
3 PHP
4 Python
5 Node.js
6 TypeScript
7 Java
8 Kotlin
9 React
10 Vue.js
11 Angular
12 Tailwind CSS
13 PostgreSQL
14 MySQL
15 MongoDB
16 Redis
17 Docker
18 Kubernetes
19 Terraform
20 AWS
21 Google Cloud
22 Azure
23 Nginx
24 Linux
25 Git
26 GitHub
27 Vercel
28 Cloudflare

LAYOUT ENGINEERING (PACKING LIKE A SPONSOR SHEET):
- Use a dense, balanced collage layout:
  - Top third: 3–4 “hero” logos at larger size (still within max size)
  - Middle: 14–16 medium logos arranged in staggered rows
  - Bottom: remaining smaller logos filling gaps cleanly
- No overlaps, no cropping, consistent gutters
- Maintain visual rhythm: mostly 3 logos per row for medium/large, up to 4 per row for smaller ones
- Keep overall composition centered with even whitespace around edges

RENDER PARAMETERS:
- Camera: orthographic straight-on, 85mm equivalent, f/8 (maximum crispness)
- Lighting: uniform studio lighting; shadow only comes from the sticker drop shadow
- Output: ultra-sharp edges, accurate logo geometry, print-ready clarity
 '''
